testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I enter valid username "standard_user".................................passed And I enter password "secret_sauce".........................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should be redirected to the dashboard................................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I enter valid username "standard_user".................................passed And I enter password "invalid"..............................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see an alert message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service".passed
